channel.title: Compiling help
channel.description:
[quote="t3h 0wn4g3, post:1, topic:57777"]i have downloaded jdk-6, clicked Compiler V1.2.bat then typed c ( compile ) and enter, and it comes up " you need to have java files for the compiler to compile ", anyone have any ideas?[/quote] then 93 said [quote="93dcthugs93, post:2, topic:57777"]Update your paths in the Compiler.[/quote]
how do i update my paths in the compiler?

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

[quote=“hi123, post:2, topic:58510”]Well Download jdk. 9 or 10 and Edit You Compile and add this in it…

@echo off title NAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

Or…

@echo off title NAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Were It Says NAMEHERE Put your Server Name.[/quote]
tyvm

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @hi123 hi123
item.description:
@hi123 wrote:

Well Download jdk. 9 or 10 and Edit You Compile and add this in it…

@echo off title NAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" server pause

Or…

@echo off title NAMEHERE Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause

Were It Says NAMEHERE Put your Server Name.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help
item.dc:creator: @t3h_0wn4g3 t3h 0wn4g3
item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

Ham compiling problem

i have downloaded jdk-6, clicked Compiler V1.2.bat then typed c ( compile ) and enter, and it comes up " you need to have java files for the compiler to compile ", anyone have any ideas?

then 93 said [quote=“93dcthugs93, post:2, topic:57777”]Update your paths in the Compiler.[/quote]

how do i update my paths in the compiler?

Read full topic
